name: Traditional Tactics Mobile
storyline:
This is the story of a kingdom. 
The king has seven children. 
 
Today is very important because heir of the throne will be decided. 
He said to the children: 
“A person who arrives the deepest floor of The Royal Tomb at fastest, I'll admit as the next king.” 
 
The Royal Tomb is a cemetery that ancestors and heroes are rested. And it's a dungeon to make a trial of the adventurer's courage. 
 
The youngest of the royal children, Prince Natri will also challenge this trial. 
Can he arrive the deepest floor?
summary:
The mobile version of Traditional Tactics released internationally on iOS for iPhones. 
It was released with a Free-to-Start format with later stages available as in-app purchases in sets of 3. 
As of September 2019 only the last stages, 18-21, have a price listed on the app page with the 5 other stage groups, 4-17, listed as free. 
 
"This is turn-based Simulation RPG. 
Rules are simple and smart, so easy to understand! 
If you like typical SRPG, this game is perfect!! 
 
Feature 
- This game is turn-based and orthodox Simulation RPG. 
- Player move units on the map and beat enemy. 
- Rules are simple, but you need good tactics. 
- If your unit is defeated, it doesn't vanish. 
- "Support Card" will help you at a crisis."
